summary: Worker fails to query workflow executions with "Workflow with the specified run identifier not found" error in a small percentage of cases. The issue is resolved after restarting workers and was fixed in SDK version 2.6.1 with RoadRunner 2023.3.
userImpact: Users are unable to query specific workflow executions intermittently, though the error resolves after worker restart.
rootCause: RoadRunner version compatibility issue causing stale worker state preventing query resolution
proposedFix: Upgrade to RoadRunner 2023.3 and SDK version 2.6.1 or later
resolutionDetails: Fixed in SDK version 2.6.1 with RoadRunner 2023.3
keyQuote: workflow_process_handle_query: Workflow with the specified run identifier not found
